video.title: WEIGHT LOSS DRUG SHOWS PROMISE FOR HELPING THOSE WITH CORONARY HEART DISEASE
video.description: Heart disease is a leading cause of death in the United States.   Coronary artery disease often occurs in obese adults and is very difficult to treat.  Researchers have been studying whether a drug approved outside the U.S. for weight loss could also help slow the progression of coronary heart disease and the results appear promising.
